project.name: JDigiDoc client jar
project.description: This script creates jar file to run easily JDigiDoc client program.

attribute.name: Class-Path
attribute.value: esteidtestcerts.jar jdcerts.jar lib/esteidtestcerts.jar lib/jdcerts.jar jdigidoc-${version}.jar lib/bcmail-jdk15on-148.jar lib/bcpkix-jdk15on-148.jar lib/bcprov-jdk15on-148.jar lib/commons-codec-1.6.jar lib/jakarta-log4j-1.2.6.jar lib/commons-compress-1.3.jar lib/jce-1_2_2.zip lib/tinyxmlcanonicalizer-0.9.0.jar lib/iaikPkcs11Wrapper.jar lib/jce_policy-1_4_2.zip .
